title: Jeremy Corbyn – 2013 Comments on Venezuela
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jeremy Corbyn, the Labour MP for Islington North, on 5 March 2013.
content:
Thanks Hugo Chavez for showing that the poor matter and wealth can be shared.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

He made massive contributions to Venezuela and a very wide world.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
